TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlElementEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/) 以及 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/) and [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 仅当调用方法时，才会发生此事件 。The event occurs only when you call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例 `Group` 从名为 UnknownElements.xml 的文件中反序列化名为的类。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. 只要在文件中找到了类中没有相应成员的元素， 就会发生该事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要尝试该示例，请将以下 XML 代码粘贴到名为 UnknownElements.xml 的文件中。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml. ``` MyGroup Large 444 West ``` [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CPP/unknownelement.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CS/unknownelement.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/VB/unknownelement.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取表示未知 XML 元素的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the unknown XML element.

value.span: 表示未知 XML 元素的对象。

span.span: The object that represents the unknown XML element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例 `Group` 从名为 UnknownElements.xml 的文件中反序列化名为的类。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. 只要在文件中找到了类中没有相应成员的元素， 就会发生该事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要尝试该示例，请将以下 XML 代码粘贴到名为 UnknownElements.xml 的文件中。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml. ``` MyGroup Large 444 West ``` [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CPP/unknownelement.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CS/unknownelement.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/VB/unknownelement.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExpectedElements As String
public: property System::String ^ ExpectedElements { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取逗号分隔的 XML 元素名称列表，这些名称应在 XML 文档实例内。

span.span: Gets a comma-delimited list of XML element names expected to be in an XML document instance.

value.span: 以逗号分隔的 XML 元素名称的列表。

span.span: A comma-delimited list of XML element names.
Each name is in the following format: :.

summary.span: 如果 XML 读取器为 ，则在遇到未知元素的位置获取行号。

span.span: Gets the line number where the unknown element was encountered if the XML reader is an .

value.span: 如果 XML 读取器为 ，则为遇到未知元素的位置处的行号；否则为 -1。

span.span: The line number where the unknown element was encountered if the XML reader is an ; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当基础 XML 读取器为时，属性才返回值 。The property returns a value only if the underlying XML reader is an . ## Examples 下面的示例 `Group` 从名为 UnknownElements.xml 的文件中反序列化名为的类。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. 只要在文件中找到了类中没有相应成员的元素， 就会发生该事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要尝试该示例，请将以下 XML 代码粘贴到名为 UnknownElements.xml 的文件中。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml. ``` MyGroup Large 444 West ``` [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CPP/unknownelement.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CS/unknownelement.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/VB/unknownelement.vb#1)]

value.span: 如果 XML 读取器为 ，则为出现未知元素的行的编号；否则为 -1。

span.span: The number in the line where the unknown element occurs if the XML reader is an ; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例 `Group` 从名为 UnknownElements.xml 的文件中反序列化名为的类。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. 只要在文件中找到了类中没有相应成员的元素， 就会发生该事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要尝试该示例，请将以下 XML 代码粘贴到名为 UnknownElements.xml 的文件中。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml. ``` MyGroup Large 444 West ``` XmlSerializer。 UnknownElement 示例 # 1XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1
